Your submission of BAP Forms Public Notice Posting Request for
{!Forms__c.Public_Notice_Title__c} was REJECTED by {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Assignee} To access the form use this link: {!Forms__c.Link} Record ID {!Forms__c.Form_Record_Name__c} !

Instructions for Submitter
1. Scroll Down the Form Window to Review 2. To view complete approver history including comments: Select "view all" in Approval History Section 3. Please address these comments by "Select Edit Tab" and Update the form and then "Submit for Approval"
